title: New Annie Icons
body:
With the new Annie icons on the PBE ([Flower](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sleDqq-Uokc/Wl-sgf4MdfI/AAAAAAAA3HA/2Vx_CC1fIbgCuCL5qu180IbuCiiLLDMlACEwYBhgL/s1600/3366.jpg), [Tibbers](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZVi_62nZNb8/Wl-sgWtJcnI/AAAAAAAA3G8/-dvvGQ_k94oKMGo9V5SjLqBbKBhSUQVVwCEwYBhgL/s1600/3367.jpg) )), I think Riot might be finally updating Annie's base model to match the representation from [Volume 1](http://artbook.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/volume-one#chapter/champions/section/annie) of the Artbook.

I don't expect much to change other than the clothing and smaller things on her base model considering the ability effects, including Tibbers, are already in-line with the look.

replies.body:
Maybe a lore update?

You know, maybe update it so that it actually mentions FIRE?

"Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense **pyrokinetic** power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for **fire** manifested early in life through unpredictable, emotional outbursts, though she eventually learned to control these “tricks.” Her favorite includes the summoning of her beloved teddy bear, Tibbers, as a **fiery** beast hellbent on destruction. Lost in the perpetual innocence of childhood, Annie wanders the dark forests, always looking for someone to play with."

From Universe, just now... ;-)
https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/annie/

If you update Annie in anyway please dont make her older. Its a popular request but a big part of her identity is her child like sppearence and innocence mixed with those devious intentions. If you make Annie older, she simply wont be Annie anymore.
Username doesn't really check out

I mean

Loli's.

.
.
.
.
https://i.imgur.com/usDcGXA.gif[/img]

I still think a teenage Annie would make an awesome lore-based Legendary skin. Keep all the spells the same, but make them darker and alot more visual effect heavy, to indicate they're more elaborate.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie x Zoe Yuri,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qU0fl0F2,comment-id=000800000007,timestamp=2018-01-18T14:14:22.894+0000)
>
> If you update Annie in anyway please dont make her older. Its a popular request but a big part of her identity is her child like sppearence and innocence mixed with those devious intentions. If you make Annie older, she simply wont be Annie anymore.

Logged in to upvote this.
Its part of her identity and what makes Annie be Annie.
Hi Scath! Can you just say too whoever made these icons that they look slick as F*ck and they should be proud of themselves.
Will do! :-)
Thank you. It's been bugging me for years.

Man, I saw a Rioter commented on this and just hoped it was a new tease about whatever the icons were being made for.

I love getting teased by Riot.
So we getting new Annie stuff? {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

So what you're saying is that Annie's voice-over doesn't do her justice, and she's actually an incredibly innocent child.
Huh.
Thank you to mary poppins for teaching a younger me what precocious meant, in addition to being a rhyming word for supercalifragilisticexpalodocious.
But..Annie is a child. How does she eat? Or...what does she feed on?
I hope no one in the future stumbles across this specific post and gets confused when they click on that link, seeing something completely irrelevant to what you just said.
So she is a...noxian citizen?
Off-topic, but can ya imagine someone like Ryze walking through where Annie lives, and they start up a conversation. I find that humorous.
Have you not read the lore? She's about way more than just FFFYYYEERRRR and BUURRNNIING

Not sure about a VU, but they did mention they were looking into further VO updates; could definitely see them coupling that with a lore update to Annie as well (possibly alongside other Noxian champions like Swain).
Don't think Annie really needs a new VO. She's a kid so I don't expect major lore stuff from her quotes.

Yeah but she's a prodigy from 2 great mages who were exiled from Noxus. There is alot of room there for a potential plot to overthrow the leadership and building a new Noxus, with her being a prophecy or a chosen one.
Even something vague like "my dad's always talking with the old man with a crow on his shoulder" would make the community real happy

Soon to be sexy old man*  
RITO PLS

There isn't really a lot from her story we can gauge based on her VO alone though. They are mostly just child-like phrases and some conversations with Tibbers, which doesn't give a lot of insight into her character even if she's just a little girl. I'm not saying she's going to get a new VO for certain, but I can see room for improvement there and why Riot might choose her (she's a well-loved champion by the community).

That was actually my thoughts as well, at least about the VO update.  I was thinking they might actually give Tibbers a voice.  It would only make sense to me that a child who was that magically talented would be able to make Tibbers capable of actual speech as well.  Most children who talk to their toys tend to imagine them talking back, after all.  I don't think there is anything wrong with Annie's actual lines currently, though if they wanted to add in a few other lines to make it a bit more in-line with the changes in Swain/Noxus in general, that would be understandable, but it would be considered a VO update to her to add in a voice for Tibbers.  

I guess I just see it like... imagine if Kindred only had Lamb's voice.  Wouldn't you really want to have Wolf's too?  And even though Tibbers isn't present for the entire match, when he is around, he's a giant, fiery, monstrous teddy-bear from hell who.... doesn't even get a nice roar and snarl?
not to mention that annie belongs to noxus now

Jesus Christ, the SA&S community are being a bit fanatic lately.

* the rumor mongering about the Varus LU still lingers.
* the enthusiastic Swain hype.
* the obsessive League movie debates.
* a few naive VU related threads
* and a few other ridiculous and random rumors

I don't get your point though, isn't that the whole point of a discussion board? If we really wanted to discuss only 100% confirmed facts we could just look at the Universe page or Surrender@20.

Those things are all popular right now in the discussion and although its not been confirmed, Riot has discussed before the disconnect between Annie's base model/splash and the world they are building. I'm not being fanatic just putting it there for people to, I don't know, **discuss**.

Maybe Annie gets a lore update similar to Varus?

I kinda doubt that she gets a visual update,because riot was in the last years pretty transparent about their champion updates(the last surprise updates were probably in season 3 or 4),
Though maybe she could just get a new standard model,while the current one gets turned into a skin?(similar to captain Gp during bilgewater?).
I don't expect a much visual update at all other than the clothing on her base model because they seem to "real-world"

If Riot Wrekz is doing a literal quick VGU, she might be a possible candidate. New model, voice over, texture, animations, and possibly some slight tweaks to her kit. (Not a lot wrong with it, but it could still be improved upon.)

I doubt that even a little VGU could be done so fast.
Keep in mind that VGUs take roughly a year to get finished,so even without a gameplay update she wouldn't come out in the next few months.

RITO AUGUST* did tweet he's working on a VGU on a female champion via twitter,but as far as I know he never revealed who (unless that champion turned out to be Jinx and her passive,but that's pretty far from a  VGU).

Riot Wrekz is _also_* working on a literal, quick VGU. Not sure what a quick VGU means, but August's project is presumably Akali or Le Blanc. 

If it's a "quick" VGU though, it's probably a champion that's already relatively close to modern standards, but just needs a little bit of help. He does note that it's not Kindred, unfortunately.
Highly doubt that. I was saying more of just her base model's clothing.
Annie looks way nicer than a lot of champs, she doesnt need a VU anytime this next half/full decade.

Wait, these have been confirmed to be Annie related icons? It doesn't say anything on Surrender@20. Where was it confirmed?
I want some solid confirmation before I get hyped.
I mean burnt flower, teddy bear. Seems like annie to me. But don't get hyped. It's just a clothing change not a full model change.

Don't worry, I'm not getting hyped. There's still no confirmation it's Annie related.

Not the 1st time Riot post some teaser that make most people think of one champ, when it's really another. Remember the debacle about the Janna Shen Sword.

The flower is questionable for sure (could be a lux related icon for her new skin for all we know) but look at that bear. That is, without a single doubt, Tibbers. At the VERY least something RELATED to Annie is being added or changed in the near future. Or they're planning on it. Could be another Sewn Chaos Amumu/Blitzcrank.

Time to make some trash memes ~~since I can't shitpost on IFunny anymore~~

Burnt flower? Clearly {{champion:63}} being an ass.

Teddy bear? Obviously new {{champion:9}} model

Annie already had a Visual Update

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3007268&page=1#post33530439

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/January_2013/Annie_Visual_Upgrade/Annie_comic_thumb.jpg

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/January_2013/Annie_Visual_Upgrade/Annie_skins_comic_thumb.jpg
but that's before the retcon. and that was a long time ago. So maybe, they need to VU annie to make her more a runeterra person cause her outfit seems out of place in runeterra.
Annie is getting an update? Sounds great
I would love the mother fuck out of an Annie VU and/or lore update. I'd want a VGU most but either way it'd have so much potential.

It says on the Surrender@20 website that the two icons are Summoner Icons.
However it does raise a question as to what Riot has in store for Annie {{champion:1}}, could SHE be the one to get a new Voice Over? Or is she infact getting a model update?
could it be a teaser for an Annie cinematic ?
She did appear in Twist of Fate, so I wouldn't think so (of course that animation was in 2013, and Garen was both in ToF and Legends never die)
